titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 4,4-Diaminostilbene-2,2-Disulphonic.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 12/11/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 4,4-Diaminostilbene-2,2-Disulphonic.
